content.question: According to the brochure, which of the following is an issue addressed by one or more of the films screened at the festival?

choices.label: Do male and female workers in comparable positions receive equal pay?
In what areas of society are women underrepresented?
Are women earning advanced degrees at the same rate as men are?
Should women be paid for homemaking and child rearing?

content.answer: Do male and female workers in comparable positions receive equal pay?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
